detaileddescription.para:
Return with the bitmap of a font.
font_p
pointer to a font
letter
an UNICODE character code
pointer to the bitmap of the letter

memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_font_t *font_p, lv_font_glyph_dsc_t *dsc_out, uint32_t letter, uint32_t letter_next)
memberdef.name: lv_font_get_glyph_dsc

detaileddescription.para:
Get the descriptor of a glyph
font_p
pointer to font
dsc_out
store the result descriptor here
letter
an UNICODE letter code
true: descriptor is successfully loaded into dsc_out. false: the letter was not found, no data is loaded to dsc_out

Get the width of a glyph with kerning
font
pointer to a font
letter
an UNICODE letter
letter_next
the next letter after letter. Used for kerning
the width of the glyph

Get the line height of a font. All characters fit into this height
font_p
pointer to a font
the height of a font
